context: In 2020, Confluent was the leading commercial Kafka provider, still private and preparing for its June 2021 IPO. Amazon MSK emerged as a significant competitor offering managed Kafka on AWS. The pandemic accelerated real-time data streaming adoption for digital transformation. Apache Pulsar gained attention as an alternative architecture. Cloud providers increasingly offered managed streaming services, creating both competition and partnership opportunities. Confluent's focus on enterprise features and Confluent Cloud differentiated from open-source Kafka.
